director.name: 伊万·特韦尔多夫斯基 Ivan I. Tverdovskiy

introduction: Prior to the release of his debut feature film "Corrections Class", Ivan Tverdovsky gained international recognition via a number of documentaries. This film observes young people playing "Space Dog", whereby you hold your breath and someone else squeezes your stomach until you genuinely run out of air, as well as engaging in other life-threatening experiments in order to escape the boredom of the prefab housing estate by gaining the ultimate kick.
